# Sensory Brain Mapping

My group from the [Swiss Center of Affective Science](https://www.unige.ch/cisa/) investigated the neuronal networks underlying fundamental processes of taste perception.

I processed all the MRI data of 97 individuals to analyze and summarize the results in support of the paper intitled [3D-Printed Mouthpiece for fMRI-Compatible Gustometers](https://www.eneuro.org/content/8/5/ENEURO.0208-21.2021).

<img src="./brain.png" alt="brain" style="width: 100%; height: auto;"/>

My work allowed to visualize the parameter distribution of the BOLD signal in 3D.
